data.lines:
Change group's name. Indicate permissions for this group of users to listed modules and functions below. You can allow free group membership for some limited time and you customers will be able to use this service only once.
Don't be afraid to try, experiment, you can always return to default settings for a deww group of registered users clicking the button "Return to default settings".
Here you can change users' membership in one of the groups.
A list of group users. After paid membership period ends, users are automatically moved to 'free membership' when accessing the system.

In section "Available functions and modules" you can set permissions for each group to some modules or functions, set a trial period of any group membership. In section "Members list" one can manage user's membership in one of groups of users.

If you are an experienced user, you can add new paid groups. After adding new groupyou should indicate group membership cost. Only after that site users will see the group in the list of available ones.

If a group id removed, all group's members will automatically be transferred to a group of free users.
Search by first symbol of the member's E-mail
Unfortunately, search results are empty. Try to change
Allow free trial group membership for a period of
Set the number of days of free trial membership (the value of the field should be a possitive figure)!
